room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Fox in a Box Seattle in Seattle
review: We had a blast. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful and did a great job. We did the Zodiac killer room which was really difficult but also really fun. I highly recommend this place!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Fox in a Box Seattle in Seattle
review: i love this kind of games and I played all three of them in two days:)Zodiac is definitely my favorite! Soooo cool!!! I felt like a little detective!The staff was very friendly and I liked the lockers provided for personal belongings - something I haven’t seen in other rooms.Jo was our game supervisor and she took our experience to a whole new level.Can’t wait to go back for them to expand and add more rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Zodiac Serial Killer" by Fox in a Box Seattle in Seattle
review: This was our first Escape Room experience and I must say that we truly enjoyed it. We chose the Zodiac theme room and it was challenging.  What made our experience extra special was meeting and working with both Ash and Austin the facilitators.  They were extremely friendly, gave us history of the theme we chose and clearly communicated the object.  We needed several clues throughout the game and both were there to give us key hints (not answers) to help us out. We will definitely go back.
